mapper.select: select r.rvno, m.name, date_format(r.rv_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as rv_date, r.path, r.head, r.title, ifnull(r.view_cnt, 0) as view_cnt, ifnull(r.hodu_cnt, 0) as hodu_cnt from review r left outer join memb m on r.mno=m.mno order by r.rvno desc limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}

select r.rvno, r.path, r.title, date_format(r.rv_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as rv_date, ifnull(r.view_cnt, 0) as view_cnt, ifnull(r.hodu_cnt, 0) as hodu_cnt from review r where r.mno=#{memberNo} order by r.rv_date desc limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}

select r.rvno, m.mno, m.name, m.path, date_format(r.rv_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as rv_date, r.head, r.title, r.cont, ifnull(r.view_cnt, 0) as view_cnt, ifnull(r.hodu_cnt, 0) as hodu_cnt from review r left outer join memb m on r.mno=m.mno where r.rvno=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into review(rvno, rv_date,head,title,cont,mno,path, view_cnt, hodu_cnt) values(#{reviewNo}, now(),#{titleHead},#{title},#{content},#{memberNo},#{photoPath}, 0, 0);
mapper.select: select r.rvno, m.name, date_format(r.rv_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as rv_date, r.path, r.head, r.title, ifnull(r.view_cnt, 0) as view_cnt, ifnull(r.hodu_cnt, 0) as hodu_cnt from review r left outer join memb m on r.mno=m.mno where r.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or r.cont like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by r.rvno desc limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}
